HG.name: HG RX-78-2 Gundam Revive (1/144)
HG.description: A modernized version of the classic RX-78-2, featuring better articulation and build quality.

HG.name: HG Unicorn Gundam (Destroy Mode) (1/144)
HG.description: Known for its detailed transformation between Unicorn and Destroy modes.

HG.name: HG Gundam Barbatos (1/144)
HG.description: A fan-favorite from 'Iron-Blooded Orphans' with excellent design and articulation.

HG.name: HG Sinanju (1/144)
HG.description: A large and beautifully detailed kit, popular for its intricate decals and imposing design.

HG.name: HG Wing Gundam Zero Custom (1/144)
HG.description: From 'Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz,' with angelic wings and a sleek, memorable design.

HG.name: HG Zaku II (1/144)
HG.description: An iconic mobile suit with great flexibility and design.

HG.name: HG Gundam Astray Red Frame (1/144)
HG.description: A sleek and flexible kit with an iconic katana weapon.

HG.name: HG Gundam Exia (1/144)
HG.description: A fan-favorite kit with great articulation and futuristic design.

HG.name: HG Strike Freedom Gundam (1/144)
HG.description: A sleek and elegant kit with wings and beam weaponry.

HG.name: HG Gundam 00 Raiser (1/144)
HG.description: Known for its excellent design and articulation, and ability to combine with the 00 Raiser.

RG.name: RG RX-78-2 Gundam (1/144)
RG.description: The first RG kit, revered for its intricate detail and articulation at a small scale.

RG.name: RG Unicorn Gundam (1/144)
RG.description: Famous for its transformation gimmicks and detail-packed build.

RG.name: RG Sazabi (1/144)
RG.description: A highly praised kit for its size, articulation, and incredible detail in Char Aznable’s iconic mobile suit.

RG.name: RG Zaku II (1/144)
RG.description: One of the best RG kits, known for its solid build, flexibility, and iconic design.

RG.name: RG Wing Gundam Zero EW (1/144)
RG.description: A standout with its angel wings and beautiful proportions, from the Endless Waltz series.

RG.name: RG Destiny Gundam (1/144)
RG.description: Known for its elegant design and iconic winged silhouette.

RG.name: RG Justice Gundam (1/144)
RG.description: A beautifully articulated kit with striking colors and design.

RG.name: RG Crossbone Gundam X1 (1/144)
RG.description: A smaller kit packed with incredible detail and articulation.

RG.name: RG Nu Gundam (1/144)
RG.description: An impressive and imposing kit with iconic fin funnels.

RG.name: RG Strike Freedom Gundam (1/144)
RG.description: Known for its beautiful gold inner frame and iconic wings.

MG.name: MG RX-78-2 Gundam Ver. 3.0 (1/100)
MG.description: Considered one of the best MG versions of the original Gundam, with enhanced articulation and detail.

MG.name: MG Gundam Exia (1/100)
MG.description: A fan-favorite from 'Gundam 00' with incredible detail and flexibility.

MG.name: MG Sinanju Ver. Ka (1/100)
MG.description: Known for its massive size, gorgeous design, and intricate decals designed by Hajime Katoki.

MG.name: MG Wing Gundam Zero Custom EW Ver. Ka (1/100)
MG.description: Popular for its sleek redesign by Katoki, with sharp wings and an elegant form.

MG.name: MG Sazabi Ver. Ka (1/100)
MG.description: Another massive and detailed kit by Katoki, praised for its presence and articulation.

MG.name: MG Gundam Astray Red Frame (1/100)
MG.description: A sleek and flexible kit with an iconic katana weapon.

MG.name: MG Destiny Gundam (1/100)
MG.description: A striking kit with impressive wings and an imposing presence.

MG.name: MG Zaku II Char Custom (1/100)
MG.description: An iconic and solidly built kit, representing Char Aznable’s famous mobile suit.

MG.name: MG Gundam F91 (1/100)
MG.description: A compact and detailed mobile suit with a sleek design.

MG.name: MG Freedom Gundam (1/100)
MG.description: A flexible and striking kit with iconic wing-mounted cannons.

PG.name: PG RX-78-2 Gundam (1/60)
PG.description: The ultimate version of the original Gundam, known for its complexity and size.

PG.name: PG Unicorn Gundam (1/60)
PG.description: Highly sought after for its transformation features and LED light system.

PG.name: PG Strike Freedom Gundam (1/60)
PG.description: A fan-favorite with massive wings and beam weaponry, considered one of the best PG kits.

PG.name: PG 00 Raiser (1/60)
PG.description: Known for its innovative engineering and the ability to combine with the 0 Raiser unit.

PG.name: PG Zeta Gundam (1/60)
PG.description: Famous for its ability to transform into its wave rider mode, though complex to build.

PG.name: PG Gundam Exia (1/60)
PG.description: A beautifully engineered kit with stunning articulation and attention to detail.

PG.name: PG Astray Red Frame (1/60)
PG.description: A standout kit with its massive katana and sleek design.

PG.name: PG Wing Gundam Zero Custom (1/60)
PG.description: A large and impressive kit with angelic wings from Endless Waltz.

PG.name: PG Gundam MK-II (1/60)
PG.description: Known for its sturdy build and striking design, an iconic suit from Zeta Gundam.

PG.name: PG Full Armor Unicorn Gundam (1/60)
PG.description: A heavily armed version of the Unicorn Gundam with an incredible display of weaponry.
